description:
This course focuses on how women can greatly improve their chance of becoming a respected, admired, and recognized business leader.

Do you constantly sell yourself short? Do you find yourself accepting roles far below your competency level, all because you are afraid of not performing to perfection in a role that is a much better match? Do you feel frustrated, trapped, and alone?

The 3 D's to Gaining a Seat at the Table is all about inspiring and empowering business women to build the confidence, clarity, and structure to make BolderÂ® moves so that they can reach higher levels of fulfillment and success in today's competitive business environment.
title: The Three "D"s to Gaining a Seat at the Table
